alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox; Marshall; Mason; McLean; Peoria; Schuyler; Stark; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 10:44AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER STORM TO BRING A WINTRY MIXTURE OF PRECIPITATION AND HEAVY SNOW TO PARTS OF CENTRAL ILLINOIS LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Illinois, along and north of a Rushville to Bloomington line. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very hazardous road conditions. The hazardous conditions may impact the morning commute, with significant impacts during the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A change from rain to mixed precipitation will occur late tonight west of the Illinois River, and early Thursday morning east of the river. This will become all snow by late Thursday morning. The heaviest snow accumulation will be from late morning through the afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com

area.areaDesc: Fulton; Knox; Marshall; Mason; McLean; Peoria; Schuyler; Stark; Tazewell; Woodford
